{{Berry|Cheri}} {{Berry|Cheri|2nd arg}} <= /w 2 arguments {{Berry|Cheri|2nd arg|3rd arg}} <= /w 3 arguments {{Berry|Cheri|2nd arg|3rd arg|4th arg}} <= /w 4 arguments Example Table: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || {{Berry|Rawst}} || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |} {|class="wikitable" |- | Test |- | [[File:Bulbasaur_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Ivysaur_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Venusaur_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Charmander_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Charmeleon_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Charizard_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Grey Shard.png|79px]][[File:GreyShardMine.png]] |- | [[File:Purple Shard.png|79px]][[File:PurpleShardMine.png]] |} ====Bag Functions test==== {{Bag2|Lucky Incense|Lucky test ?}} <- Bag2 set the image link to the second argument, but seems like never used anywhere {{Bag3|EXP Share|EXP test ?}} <- Bag3 doesn't show anything if second argument, just the picture {{Bag4|Pokéball|Poké test ?}} <- Bag4 works perfectly ====Template test for translators==== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Parc Safari|Commun}}
